profileAlternative.name: Vitali Zaidman
profileAlternative.headline: Full Stack, React, Next.js Technical Lead
profileAlternative.summary: I can be hired as part of our companies consulting, mentoring and software development services: https://goo.gl/UUFEF2 , vitalikz@welldone-software.com

aboutAlternative.text: I can be hired as part of our companies consulting, mentoring and software development services: https://goo.gl/UUFEF2 , vitalikz@welldone-software.com

positions.title: WellDone Software Solutions Ltd.
positions.description:
➮ Leading short and long term projects.
➮ Expert in React Redux Next.JS after researching and working with it for a couple of years.
➮ Advising and developing advanced web solutions in other projects.
➮ Writing various technical articles and sharing knowledge inside our company and with our customers.

Our customers I worked with:

◉ 10Bis.co.il ◉

➜ April 2018 - Now

In charge of the re-built of the 10Bis.co.il web site using Nextjs and many other modern tools.

◉ PowToon ◉

➜ September 2017 - Now

In charge of development of advanced features and keeping the project up to date with the most cutting edge technology.

➜ March 2016 - September 2017

Leading the migration of PowToon.com from flash to HTML5 using React+Redux.

This was a very challenging project that was done on time with more features then originally planned.

The main challenge was to create a relatively big project from scratch- We were developing many
features in parallel while keeping it the website usable, high performing and cross browser supported, including IE :) , although the project is very UI oriented.

◉ UENI ◉

➜ September 2017 - March 2018

Responsible for the rebuilding of UENI.com from scratch using React+Redux+Next.js.

The main challenge in this project was SEO optimization- we wanted to make sure the site and it's sub sites are very high in search engines using various advanced techniques like using Next.js to render
React Redux website on the server.

Another challenge was to build it with international and multi-language support.
…
see more
